Name: <color=#00DD00FF> Demeo Revolutions (SMALL PROGRESSIVE) </color>
Longdesc:
The same as <color=#660033FF>Demeo Revolutions (Small Progressive)</color> but with the following tweaks:

- Replenish Armor is <color=#FF0000FF>5 HP</color> instead of 4
- Barricade is <color=#FF0000FF>15 HP</color> instead of 8
- Lure is <color=#FF0000FF>20 HP</color> instead of 12
- Torch is <color=#FF0000FF>10 HP</color> instead of 4
- Repeating Ballista is <color=#FF0000FF>10 HP</color> instead of 7
- Arli is <color=#FF0000FF>10 HP</color> instead of 8
- Verochka is <color=#FF0000FF>10 HP</color> instead of 7
- Detect Enemies is <color=#FF0000FF>10 HP</color> instead of 3

- The following cards are <color=#FF0000FF>Free</color> to play
  - Net
  - Web Bomb
  - War Cry
  - Howl of The Ancients
  - Poison Bomb
  - Flash Bomb

- The following cards are <color=#FF0000FF>7x7 AoE</color>
  - Healing

-<color=#FFA500FF> Gold</color> piles are <color=#FF0000FF>50 or 51</color> each
- Hitting Verochka, Arli or Torch causes <color=#FF0000FF>Thorns</color>
- All heroes except Guardian can <color=#FF0000FF>Backstab</color>
- All enemies can <color=#FF0000FF>Open Doors</color>
